DictionaryItem.Value: uWebshop
Global Fields
Title
The title of this item, as shown on the page
Urlname
The urlname of this item, as shown in the addressbar of the visitors browser
Meta-Description
The meta-description of this item, as seen in searchengine results
Tags
Keywords that describe this item
Sub-Categories
Select the categories that will be shown as sub-categories of this category
Description
The content of this item that will describe the item on the page
Image
Select one image for this item
Images
Select one or multiple images for this item
Files
Select one or multiple files for this item
Disable
Disableling this item will exclude it from the store
SKU
Stock keeping unit is a distinct item number to distinguish it from all other items in the catalog
Product Categories

Select all the categories this product should be in. The parent-category is included as main-category by default. If the product does not have a partent-category, the first selected category will be the main-category
Length
Length of the item. All lengths should be consistent in measurements to have uWebshop handle them correctly
Width
Width of the item. All widths should be consistent in measurements to have uWebshop handle them correctly
Height
Height of the item. All heights should be consistent in measurements to have uWebshop handle them correctly
Weight
Weight of the item. All weights should be consistent in measurements to have uWebshop handle them correctly
Price
Price of the item. The currency is defined on the uWebshop store node in the stores section
Ranges
A range can be used to stack values, where the 'from' value is included and the 'to' value excluded in the range
Value Added Tax Percentage
The VAT is defined globally on the store node, but can be overwritten on a per-item basis
Stock Amount
The amount of stock left for this product
Order Count
How many times has this item been ordered in the store
Status of the stock
Enable/Disable the use of stock for this item. Items without stock can be ordered unlimited
Enable backorders?
Enable/Disable the use of backorders for this item. Items on backorder can be ordered even when the stock has reached 0. The stock will be updated to negative values
Use variant stock
When enabled the stock of the product is not used, but only of it's variants. If enabled, but no variants are created the stock of the product will be used
Store specific template
Overrules the default template set on the properties tab to enable store-specific templates
The variant group
Variants are grouped together by the group name. Variant groups can be stacked per orderline to combine multiple variants on one product
Variant group required for product?
When a variant is set to required, the customer has to add one variant of the group to the orderline of the product before the order can be confirmed
Discount Fields
The discount type
Discount types can be a discount amount, a discount percentage, a new price or free shipping of the order
Discount
The discount value, this value is dependant of the Discount Type (amount/percentage/new price)
Use the countdown
Activate the countdown for this discount to limit the amount of customers being able to use this discount
Countdown number left to use
Number of times this discount can still be used by customers when the countdown is enabled
Orderline Condition

On the Xth item will set the discount when x items of the selected discount items on the order discounts are added to the order by the customer. When a percentage is set, it will be on the cheapest of x items. Per set of X items will set the discount when a set of the same x items of the selected discount items are added to the order by the customer. When a percentage discount is set, it will be over the amount of x items combined
Condition number of items
Corresponds with the orderline condition to set the 'x' item count for the condition
Minimum amount of the order
The minimum amount of the order before this discount is valid
Coupon code
Adding a coupon code to a discount will forces the customer to first add the coupon code to the order before the discount is applied
Coupon codes

Add multiple coupon codes to a discount will forces the customer to first add the coupon code to the order before the discount is applied. Each coupon code has its own usage count to make them usable multiple times
Allow discount once per customer
This will check if a logged-in customer already did use this discount in a previous order, before the discount is applied
Member Groups
Make the discount only valid if the logged-in customer is in one of the selected member groups
Discount Items
Select the items that trigger this discount
Products or Product Variants
Select the products or product variants this discount should apply to
Exclude variants when a product is selected

By default if a product is selected for discount the discount is applied to the product + variant on the orderline. By excluding variants on the discount the discount is only calculated over the product price
Affected Orderlines
Order discounts are calculated over the total of all orderlines. Selecting a product, or product variant here will only calculate the discount over the orderlines that contains the selected items
Email Fields
The template to render this e-mail
Choose a template that will be used to create this email using the title and description on this node and the (order) data of the template
Order Fields
Set the status of this order
Change the status of the curent order. Choose to have e-mails as set on the store document are send with the status change
Is this order Paid?
Mark if the order is paid or not
Order Details
The Order Information. The order can be editted by changing the information on the sub-nodes of the order node
Unique Order Id
The unique order Id to identify this order
Provider Fields
Type of Payment Provider
Select if this is an online payment provider, a payment in store provider or if the payment will be made when the goods are deliverd at the customers addres
Zone
A zone defines which countries can pay using this payment provider
Success Page after payment
The Umbraco node a customer is forwarderd to after a successful payment
Error Page after payment
The Umbraco node a customer is forwarderd to after a failed payment
In Testmode?
Online providers can use the testmode to test transactions
Type of Shipping Provider
Select if this provider is a provider that delivers the order to the customer, or that the customer should come pick-up the order
The range to apply this shipping provider to
Select the range (order amount, order quantity or total weight of the order) the order should contain before this shipping provider can be chosen
Start value of the range
The start value of the range. This value is included in the range (>=). When the rangetype is amount, use cents
End value of the range
The end value of the range. This value is excluded in the range (<). When the rangetype is amount, use cents. When using 0, uWebshop will translate it to 'maximum value possible'
Overrule other shipping options
When overrule is selected and the overrule shipping provider is matched with the current order of the customer, only overrule providers will be shown
Store Fields
The culture of this store
The language culture of this store is used to get the right dictionary items when sending emails
The country this store is located
Set the country this store is subjected to VAT
The Country for the currency
Set the country for the currency this store will use
The default VAT
Set the default VAT used throughout the store. Can be overruled per sellable item
Prefix Ordernumbers
Set a word that will be added in front of the ordernumbers for this store
Template to build ordernumbers
Define how the ordernumber will be created. You can use #orderId# #orderIdPadded#, #storeAlias#, #day#, #month# and #year#, plus any characters you need
Next order number
Define the ordernumber that the next order will start with. If the number is already used, the first unused number will be used
Use Stock?
When enabled, stock will be used for this store
Use Store specific stock?
When enabled, the stock will look for a store specific stock field and only update that field instead of global stock. If no store-specific stock is found, the global stock will be used
E-mailaddress used to send mails from
The e-mailaddress the store will set as the sender address of all e-mails send
E-mail sender name
The name the store will set as the sender name of all e-mails send
E-mailaddress used to send mails to
The e-mailaddress uWebshop will send the emails to when emails are send to the store
Create Account E-mail
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the customer creates an account
Forgot Password E-Mail
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the customer asks for a password reset
Confirm E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store after checkout when the customer confirms the order. The order is not paid at this point
Confirm E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer after checkout when the customer confirms the order. The order is not paid at this point
Online Paid E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store after checkout when the customer paid the order using an online payment provider
Online Paid E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer after checkout when the customer paid the order using an online payment provider
Offline Payment E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store after checkout when the customer selected an offline payment provider
Offline Payment E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer after checkout when the customer selected an offline payment provider
Online Payment Failed E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store after checkout when the customer selected an online payment provider, but the payment failed
Online Payment Failed E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer after checkout when the customer selected an online payment provider, but the payment failed
Order Dispatched E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "dispatched"
Order Dispatched E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "dispatched"
Order Cancelled E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "cancelled"
Order Cancelled E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "cancelled"
Order Closed E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "closed"
Order Closed E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "closed"
Order Pending E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "pending"
Order Pending E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "pending"
Order Temporary Out Of Stock E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "temporary out of stock"
Order Temporary Out Of Stock E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "temporary out of stock"
Order Undeliverable E-Mail Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "undeliverable"
Order Undeliverable E-Mail Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "undeliverable"
Order Returned Store
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the store when the order status is changed to "returned"
Order Returned Customer
Select the e-mail node in the uWebshop tree that is used to send to the customer when the order status is changed to "returned"
Setting Fields
All prices are including VAT?
When enabled, uWebshop will handle all the prices entered in the store as including VAT
Force lowercase urls
This setting forces uWebshop to output all URLs in lowercase.
Lifetime of an incomplete order
Set the lifetime of incomplete orders in minutes (default 360 minutes)
Enable backorders by default
Use backorders to enable the ordering of products when there is no stock. This setting can be overwritten on products and variants
Enable testmode
Make this store work in testmode to set all orders, payment- and shipping-providers as in testmode. Can be overwritten on each payment/shipping provider
Set Currencies
Set the currencies available for this store. The index (exchange rate) is added over the default price value entered on an item
Creates the uWebshop Section in the Umbraco Content Tree
Catalog
The catalog contains all your categories, product and product variants.
Category
A category in your store.
Category Repository
The category repository contains all the categories in your store. Can also include products and product variants.
Product
A product in your store.
Product Repository
The product repository can contain products and product variants to sell in your store.
Product Variant
A product variant for a product in your store.
Discount Repository
The discount repository contains your order and product discounts.
Discount Order Section
The discount order section contains your order discounts. Order discounts are discounts that are handled when the customer adds something to their basket.
Discount Product Section
The discount product section contains your product discounts. Product discounts are discounts that are visible when the customer view catalog data before adding to the basket.
Order Discount
Order discounts are discounts that are handled when the customer adds something to their basket.
Product Discount
Product discounts are discounts that are visible when the customer view catalog data before adding to the basket.
Email Repository
The email repository contains the emails to be send to the store and the customers.
Email Template Customer Section
The email template customer section contains the emails to be send to the customers.
Email Template Store Section
The email template store section contains the emails to be send to the store email address.
Customer Email
The email template used to create e-mails to customers. Attach emails to events of a store on the store node
StoreEmail
The email template used to create e-mails to the store. Attach emails to events of a store on the store node
Order Repository
The order repository contains all the orders and the order status folders of your stores
Date Folder
When opening an order, orders are displayed with the help of date folders to quickly identify orders
Order
An order placed in your store
Order Section
Easily view orders by creating order section with a specific status
Order Store Folder
Groups orders by store
Ordered Product
An ordered product contains all the information that is saved of the product in the order
Ordered Product Variant
An ordered product variant contains all the information that is saved of the product variant in the order
Payment Provider Repository
The payment provider repository contains all the payment providers and the payment zones
Payment Provider Section
The payment provider section contains all the payment providers and their methods
Payment Provider Zone Section
The payment provider zone section contains all the payment providers zones
Payment Provider
A payment provider for your store to allow customer to make payments
Payment Provider Method
A payment provider method can set a price to a payment provider. One payment provider can have multiple methods.
Payment Provider Zone
A payment provider zone defines what countries can pay with a certain payment provider.
Shipping Provider Repository
The shipping provider repository contains all the shipping providers and the shipping zones
Shipping Provider Section
The shipping provider section contains all the shipping providers and their methods
Shipping Provider Zone Section
The shipping provider zone section contains all the shipping providers zones
Shipping Provider
A shipping provider for your store to allow customer to select a delivery method
Shipping Provider Method
A shipping provider method can set a price to a shipping provider. One shipping provider can have multiple methods.
Shipping Provider Zone
A shipping provider zone defines what countries can pay with a certain shipping provider.
Store Repository
The store repository contains all the stores for your webshop. One shop can have unlimited stores
Store
A store in uWebshop defines the currency, the country of the store, when and what emails to send and other settings
Settings
Set global settings for uWebshop that work on all your stores
